questions.question: As the number of components in a solution increases, the individual vapour pressure .............?

explanations.a: According to Raoult's law, adding more solute components lowers the vapour pressure.
explanations.c: There is an effect; this is incorrect.

questions.question: For non-electrolytes, the value of "i" is .........?

explanations.a: Non-electrolytes do not dissociate, so van 't Hoff factor i = 1.
explanations.b: This applies for electrolytes, not non-electrolytes.
explanations.d: i cannot be zero; at least one particle exists.

questions.question: Ebullioscopic constant of the solvent depends upon ...........

explanations.a: Incorrect — it depends on the solvent, not solute.
explanations.b: Correct — the ebullioscopic constant is a property of the solvent.
explanations.c: Temperature influences boiling but constant is intrinsic to solvent.
